author: mightypenguin
content:
Is there any current work on WASM? (specifically some form of EVM WASM)
Last I heard it was a super big change and people had given up on it until after L2, merge, sharding(?) get mature.
But seeing non-blockchain projects like this make me curious.
https://github.com/wasmerio/wasmer

content: wasm separately from ethereum is still active, as it was created with a different set of motivations in mind
